structure.unit: PHYSICIANS, OSTEOPATHS, PODIATRISTS, AND RELATED MEDICAL PRACTITIONERS

law.catch_line: Definitions for KRS 311.530 to 311.620 and KRS 311.990(4) to (6).
law.history: Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 175, sec. 1, effective July 12, 2006. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 585, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 35, sec. 1, effective July 13, 2004. -- Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 130, sec. 4, effective July 15, 2002; and ch. 211, sec. 35, effective July 15, 2002. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 343, sec. 18, effective July 14, 2000; and ch. 376, sec. 8, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 228, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1998; and ch. 426, sec. 537, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 482, sec. 11, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 302, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1986. -- Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 251, sec. 1, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 188, sec. 251, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 107, sec. 1, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. VI, sec. 90(9); and ch. 331, sec. 1. -- Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 218, sec. 5. -- Amended 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 152, sec. 146. -- Amended 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 126, sec. 29. -- Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 150, sec. 1.
